vclaim: Three outfits from "The Goonies" inspired character Dennis Nedry's wardrobe for "Jurassic Park."
title: Did ‘The Goonies’ Inspire Dennis Nedry’s Outfits in ‘Jurassic Park’?
subtitle: A TikTok video presented the idea that several outfits from the 1980s classic "The Goonies" inspired a character's wardrobe in "Jurassic Park."
author: Jordan Liles
